web

Bring your ideas to life.

approach

At Studiogenix, we take our client's work very serious. We understand the relevance of a solid web presence in this digital age we are now. A website being your company's most important asset serves as a window into the value you offer for your potential customers.

When creating your website, we go the extra mile to make sure it is very engaging and the user experience is top notch for your customers. While building the website, we keep the purpose behind the website in mind, to bring you massive return on investment.

Wordpress Content Management System

Complete access to your websites content management system (CMS) and a huge range of options to help customize the content to your taste.

Mobile Responsive Design

Every websites designed and built are done with mobile-friendliness in mind, so that the layout and/or content fits any screen size.

Ecommerce Web Design

A robust eCommerce website serves as the foundation of your online retail business. We build eCommerce solution that increase conversion rates and sales.

Integrated Web Security

We implement array of measures to keep your website safe from malicious contents and internet vulnerabilities.

Ongoing Upgrade and Technical Support

We will stick around for when you need us, whether itâ€™s tweaking the functionality we created for you or correcting a bug. Our familiarity with your code will give us a big advantage in making these changes as fast and painless for you as possible.

Testing

We provide constant testing of the application to ensure smooth and bug-free work of the apps.

Process

Our web design process is very simple, transparent and easy to understand.

It is our job to ensure that the whole process is as seamless as possible.

  • 1. Planning

    To get an idea of the scope and requirements of your project. We sit down with you and ask in-depth questions to help understand your brand, goals, target audience and desired project outcomes.

  • 2. Design

    Design phase commences almost immediately we get needed information to work with. Color palettes, layout options and font types are decided. Varities of websites mock-ups that match your vision are presented to you for feedback.

  • 3. Development

    The design elements and website mock-ups that was approved by you in phase 2 is now integrated into the development phase. The core structure and functionality of your website now start coming to life.

  • 4. Testing

    Once the website development phase is completed. A quality assurance test is now carried out to ensure the website meet your standards and there is no defect in the website functionality.

  • 5. Launch

    It is now time to go live with the website after a series of pre-launch check has been conducted. After launch, we will still be at the ready for any subsequent support or help.
